website_summaries.verdict: Buildable coverage so you can choose how much or how little you need.
pros: Transfer and waterproof formula is good for all weather conditions
Perfect shades designed to target under eye circles and discoloration spots
cons: This formula is thicker, and is best for someone who needs heavy coverage

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t have a natural look!
customer_reviews.text: Too thick it can’t spread easily and evenly. Color is lighter than picture so it doesn’t have a natural appearance. Looks like whitish circles around my eyes. I don’t recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Sahar

customer_reviews.title: This is by far my favorite product by Clinique
customer_reviews.text: This is by far my favorite product by Clinique. It goes on smoothly, lasts all day and looks great. Super easy to wear and doesn't cause irritation and actually does make your eyes look refreshed, even when I have't had as much sleep as I should, I never look tired while wearing it.
customer_reviews.author: kindlemom1 (My Guilty Obsession Blog)

customer_reviews.title: Very effective for dark circles
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful high quality concealer. I use it daily. No issues with clumping or gunking. Blends great with skin color.
customer_reviews.author: Bearwife

customer_reviews.title: By far my favorite under eye concealer
customer_reviews.text: By far my favorite under eye concealer. It has a yellowish tint that covers dark circles completely. It goes on easily and lasts all day.
customer_reviews.author: Kate Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Clinique makes very good products. I have sensitive skin
customer_reviews.text: Clinique makes very good products. I have sensitive skin. I cannot use Almay or other brands but, I can use Clinique. I get good coverage for my dark circles. I have dry skin so I dab a little on my finger with a tiny bit of moisturizer, mix it, then apply. It works well. I would purchase this again.
customer_reviews.author: Rhonda  Garcia

customer_reviews.title: Good eye cover cream
customer_reviews.text: Good eye cover cream. Hide imperfections very well, and only needs to be applied once as it lasts all day.
customer_reviews.author: T. Rick

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I buy aprox once every 10 months it lasts all day works well for me
customer_reviews.author: gigi

customer_reviews.title: Favorite concealer
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this product for years. It's the best concealer I've ever tried. It covers the dark circles under my eyes very well. A little bit goes a long way which also makes it a great value.
customer_reviews.author: SJU

customer_reviews.title: Concealer watery like it’s old and gritty
customer_reviews.text: This product doesn’t have the same feel as what I usually buy. Concealer watery like it’s old and gritty. Poor quality
customer_reviews.author: sheila cook

customer_reviews.title: Great concealer
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this concealer to cover my eye bags (I don't have super dark bags but they are there) for almost 4 years now and have been so happy with it I've never switched product! Does a great job covering up and stays on all day without being cake-y or cracking. Having tried other products of similar price prior, this one is a clear winner.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality and texture
customer_reviews.text: I love this concealer. I have been using it for long time. Clinique brand is usually more expensive than other ones, but I like the quality and texture
customer_reviews.author: Sandy Maroun

customer_reviews.title: Great Coverage
customer_reviews.text: The tiniest spec ford the longest . This stuff will last forever and it’s great coverage!!
customer_reviews.author: Amy Jahn

customer_reviews.title: Clinique
customer_reviews.text: The best under the eye and blemish concealer. I have had several of my friends take mine and I have to keep buying more. Guess I should just tell them no. If you buy it, use just a dab...it goes a long long way.
customer_reviews.author: Mary L. Bisutti

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: It is a small size but it lasts for many applications. It covers panda eyes just great!
customer_reviews.author: Vero

customer_reviews.title: Less at Ulta
customer_reviews.text: I love this product, it is the best make up I have ever used to covert dark under eye circles. One piece of advice..don't buy it here. Ulta has the same concealer for $7 less.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It’s dry
customer_reviews.text: No moisture for under your eyes. Very dry. Would not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Winona

customer_reviews.title: Great concealer.
customer_reviews.text: Quality product, goes on light. Seems good for your skin, have been using it for years. Whenever I try a new one I always come back to Clinique.
customer_reviews.author: Jen B

customer_reviews.title: good
customer_reviews.text: its a perfect colour match, but i have dark shadows, so i need quite a bit, sometimes it bunches up and creases.
customer_reviews.author: victoria nicholls

customer_reviews.title: Good coverage
customer_reviews.text: Goes on smoothly and great coverage! A little goes a long way.
customer_reviews.author: Silvana Bishop

customer_reviews.title: ... used this product for many years and am always pleased with it
customer_reviews.text: I've used this product for many years and am always pleased with it.
customer_reviews.author: Francine S. Wood

customer_reviews.title: Good for older skin
customer_reviews.text: Have been using it for years. Good for older skin.
customer_reviews.author: Regina B.

customer_reviews.title: Great concealer
customer_reviews.text: I love Clinique products. I have been using this concealer for a few years and never needed to change.
customer_reviews.author: Safferdian

customer_reviews.title: great
customer_reviews.text: very good benefit/price ratio excellent deal good product. Design and quality are great, so far very happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Homero Murzi

customer_reviews.title: I think that this product has a very good quality.
customer_reviews.text: I've bought it for many years. It covered very well. I have a sensitive skin. I think that this product has a very good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah Coutinho Gil Nunes

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Clinique's cosmetics are the best on the market for cover up, covering and enhancing!
customer_reviews.author: Mar

customer_reviews.title: More than eye concealer
customer_reviews.text: A little bit goes a long way! The tube container has a very narrow nose so that just a drop can be dispensed. I always use a moisturizer as a base and found this product covers so well that I went beyond the eyes and was able to spread it in the middle zone of my face. It evened out my coloring of my whole face! For everyday use that's all I put on my face. For a more finished coverage I brush on a powdered foundation. This is an excellent product.
customer_reviews.author: Miso Pretty

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: It arrived super quick and in a crazy amount of packaging! The color is great and so is the product. I'm 35 and I use this around my eyes instead of foundation! It does the trick and it's not super-thick. I love clinique!
customer_reviews.author: JustJamie

customer_reviews.title: ... havent used it yet but im sure its a nice product, because this brand always make great
customer_reviews.text: my wife havent used it yet but im sure its a nice product, because this brand always make great stuff
customer_reviews.author: Hector B.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great to deal with, received order fast, Thank you, will use again.
customer_reviews.author: P. Wallace

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: Only problem was the fact that the pictures don't resemble the actual shade of the concealer very well! Don't be stupid like me, and make sure you look up some swatches of the product before buying. Overall nice concealer for under eye circles for the price.
customer_reviews.author: EaterofFood

customer_reviews.title: Good coverage!
customer_reviews.text: Provides great coverage under the eyes. I even use it in other small areas as a general concealer. I have been using this product. I like a heavier concealer for under my eyes and this one gets the job done! It doesn't feel to heavy under the eyes which is also a nice thing about it.
customer_reviews.author: B Daniels

customer_reviews.title: I'm not sure if it was old or what but ...
customer_reviews.text: I'm not sure if it was old or what but when I squeezed the bottle only clear oil came out, so I mixed it(shook it) but still everytime I use it I have to shake it😕
customer_reviews.author: JCOlivas#2

customer_reviews.title: The only one for me
customer_reviews.text: Honestly, this is the only acne and under-eye cover-up I've found that truly covers!
customer_reviews.author: Dr H

customer_reviews.title: Best concealer!
customer_reviews.text: Love this concealer. I have been using it since college. It was nice to buy here b/c I didn't have time to tun to the mall.
customer_reviews.author: holreading

customer_reviews.title: Great product!  Great seller!
customer_reviews.text: I was familiar with this product before I purchased it through Amazon. The concealer that I received was exactly what I wanted, and the seller got it to me in the expected time frame.
customer_reviews.author: Donna

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Did not go on as smoothly as I felt it should.
customer_reviews.author: Marilyn Scott

customer_reviews.title: I have used this for a few years. It ...
customer_reviews.text: I have used this for a few years. It covers well (I have some skin issues that leaves scars) and stays on all day.
customer_reviews.author: kcat

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: It cover perfectly my dark eyes. Blends natural with my skin.
customer_reviews.author: Azize

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product!
customer_reviews.text: A fabulous eye concealer! Covers dark and puffy under eye marks.
customer_reviews.author: K. S. Wolf

customer_reviews.title: Great concealer
customer_reviews.text: I've used this product for a long time. It really covers circles!
customer_reviews.author: Merry D.

customer_reviews.title: great concealer
customer_reviews.text: product is light, not greasy, I'm using it for years and IMO it is one of the best concealers.
customer_reviews.author: viviana

customer_reviews.title: I'm happy with it
customer_reviews.text: A tiny bit goes a long way so use sparingly. I'm happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Tea

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: This is a color issue..unless you are naturally Oompa Loompa colored.
customer_reviews.author: Lyon

customer_reviews.title: works great
customer_reviews.text: Very good product, blends well and works well with sensitive skin.
customer_reviews.author: slp

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: For my complexion I need deep honey which you don't make anymore.
customer_reviews.author: WDD

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: A different color than my last tube. Definitely a darker shade.
customer_reviews.author: Robin

customer_reviews.title: it works great, provides good coverage yet light enough it is ...
customer_reviews.text: I've used this for years, it works great, provides good coverage yet light enough it is not cakey or fakey!
customer_reviews.author: Kikashi

customer_reviews.title: Carry it with me allllll the time!
customer_reviews.text: It really conceals. I like it a lot. However, it is very dry.
customer_reviews.author: Martha

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Product
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this product for over five years... I have had dark circles under my eyes for more that 30 years. This is the best product I have found to cover them up and now my beautiful 22 year old is using it too!
customer_reviews.author: Taylor L.

customer_reviews.title: got what i paid for , no more
customer_reviews.text: if price were lower I would buy again, but I kind of feel I got lucky getting the correct shade.
customer_reviews.author: Lee

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works great, although I have found that it is important to get the right shade for your face
customer_reviews.author: B. Sielicki
